queries.query:
-- Sample MySQL queries for testing
-- These queries will be executed against the demo database

-- Create a test table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
queries.error: 1142 (42000): CREATE command denied to user 'v-token-mysql-role-Yke80aLpn9qj5'@'192.168.65.1' for table 'users'

queries.query:
-- Insert sample data
INSERT INTO users (username, email) VALUES
('john_doe', 'john@example.com'),
('jane_smith', 'jane@example.com'),
('bob_wilson', 'bob@example.com')

-- Query to select all users
SELECT * FROM users

-- Query to count users
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users FROM users

-- Update a user's email
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@newdomain.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe'

-- Query to select updated user
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
